title: Petition for freedom from Massachusetts - effect

content.question: The ideas expressed in the excerpt contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: The extension of voting rights to African Americans in the North
The end of the trans-Atlantic slave trade
The mass migration of African Americans from the South to the North
The adoption of plans for gradual emancipation in the North

content.answer: The adoption of plans for gradual emancipation in the North

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
